channel.title: [PI] How do I change NPC drops?
channel.description:
I'm in dire need of a full blown NPC drop tutorial for PI.
* How to add NPC drops * How to remove NPC drops * How to change NPC drops rate
Can someone please help?

item.title: [PI] How do I change NPC drops?
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]I haven’t done drops in a while, so my guide my be wrong.

But, just mess around with it.[/quote]

Alright, no problem at all.

Thanks for the help so far though, I really really appreciate it.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do I change NPC drops?

item.title: [PI] How do I change NPC drops?
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Sorry for that, I failed on spacing.

NPC_ID : DROP_RARITY [t] ITEM_ID : AMOUNT [t] ITEM_ID : AMOUNT [t] ITEM_ID : AMOUNT

[t] meaning TAB.[/quote]

Oh okay, thank you.

And one more small question.

How do you determine drop rarity? On a scale of what to what?

1-10? Is 1 very rare and 10 not so rare?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do I change NPC drops?

item.title: [PI] How do I change NPC drops?
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

Thank you so much, but I don’t quite fully understand this:

NPC_ID : DROP_RARITYITEM_ID : AMOUNTITEM_ID : AMOUNTITEM_ID : AMOUNT

It’s the NPC ID, then drop_rarityitem? What exactly does that mean? Same thing with the amountitem and amountitem and then I assume amount means the amount you want dropped every time it’s dropped. If you could explain this, I’d be forever grateful.

Read full topic
